conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render successfully demonstrates a true 3D transformation with visible wall height and thickness, perceptible interior volumes, an angled view, and a removed roof to expose the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness (5/5). Floors are clearly separated (3/3). Interior volume is very perceivable (4/4). Proper 3D wall corner geometry (3/3). Well-executed angled view (5/5), interior visible from elevated perspective (3/3), minimal distortion (2/2). Roof/ceiling cleanly removed (5/5), interior spaces fully visible (3/3). Clean geometry, but some minor artifacts near the balcony (1/2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms and general adjacency (3/3, 4/4). Relative room proportions are largely preserved (3/3). Major room identities match well with inferred layout (2/2). Major wall positions align well (5/5), but the bottom-left storage/utility area seems resized and simplified, and the balcony shape is altered (2/3 for wall lengths, 1/2 for internal partitions). Doors are present and on correct walls (4/4). Windows are mostly absent, except for a few indicated by openings in the 2D plan which aren't represented as 'windows' but simple cutouts (1/2). Openings are proportionally sized (2/2).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) is present (4/4). Kitchen elements are present (2/2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2/2). Furniture is placed in correct rooms (3/3). Furniture scale appears reasonable (2/2). Orientation is logical (2/2).

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable (4/4). Geometry is readable (4/4). Interior is clearly visible (3/3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3/3). Consistent, albeit stylized, material usage (2/2). No major rendering artifacts (2/2). Clean background (2/2).

detected_errors.description: Geometric distortion and simplification of the bottom-left storage/utility area and the balcony shape compared to the 2D plan.
Windows are not explicitly rendered as window objects; they are just represented as openings, leading to ambiguity.

summary: The 3D transformation is generally good, demonstrating faithful 3D conversion fundamentals and strong interior element representation, though some geometric deviations in minor areas and window representation prevent an 'Excellent' rating.
